original: nub gsum pa nas rims kyis 'jug pa ni/_/phyag rdor 'gro bzangs bcu🔽bdun bdag nyid dang /_/klu grub mdo lugs lha dgu'i bdag nyid dang /_/ lcags phub ma ni bcu gsum bdag nyid dang /_/'jam dpal gsang ldan nga
analyzed: nub gsum pa nas rims kyis 'jug pa ni/_/phyag rdor 'gro bzangs bcu bdun bdag nyid dang /_/klu grub mdo lugs lha dgu'i bdag nyid dang /_/ lcags phub ma ni bcu gsum bdag nyid dang /_/'jam dpal gsang ldan nga
translated: The gradual approach, which begins with the third of the three western [deities], is🔽the excellent protector of beings Vajrapāṇi, who has seventeen [deities],🔽Nāgārjuna’s system of the sūtras, which has nine [deities],🔽the Iron Fortress, which has thirteen [deities],

original: gsum bdag nyid la/_/tshan ta go mi'i bcu bdun bdag nyid lags/_/rta
analyzed: gsum bdag nyid la/_/tshan ta go mi'i bcu bdun bdag nyid lags/_/rta
translated: and the secret Mañjuśrī, which has three [deities].🔽The Caṇḍa[mahāroṣaṇa] has seventeen [deities],

original: mgrin rgyal po bcu bdun bdag nyid yin/_/thugs rje chen po bcu gsum
analyzed: mgrin rgyal po bcu bdun bdag nyid yin/_/thugs rje chen po bcu gsum
translated: and the king of Hayagrīva has seventeen [deities].🔽The Great Compassionate One has thirteen [deities],

original: bdag nyid can/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu gsum bdag nyid can/_/me
analyzed: bdag nyid can/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu gsum bdag nyid can/_/me
translated: and the maṇḍala of mind has thirteen [deities].🔽The blazing fire has seventeen [deities],

original: ltar 'bar ba bcu bdun bdag nyid do/_/rdo rje dbyings ni nga gsum bdag
analyzed: ltar 'bar ba bcu bdun bdag nyid do/_/rdo rje dbyings ni nga gsum bdag
translated: and the vajra realm has eighty-three [deities].🔽The glorious Supreme Original has one [deity],

original: nyid dang /_/dpal mchog dang po de gcig gang dag te/_/kun rig rtsha ba🔽brgya dang lnga'i bdag_/gtshug tor dgu ni so bdun bdag nyid dang /_/don
analyzed: nyid dang /_/dpal mchog dang po de gcig gang dag te/_/kun rig rtsha ba brgya dang lnga'i bdag_/gtshug tor dgu ni so bdun bdag nyid dang /_/don
translated: and the all-knowing one has one hundred and five [deities].🔽The nine uṣṇīṣas have thirty-seven [deities],🔽and the maṇḍala of Amoghasiddhi has seventy-seven [deities].

original: grub dal ni nga bdun bdag nyid dang /_/'gro ba 'dul ba nga bdun bdag nyid
analyzed: grub dal ni nga bdun bdag nyid dang /_/'gro ba 'dul ba nga bdun bdag nyid
translated: The Vinayaka has seventy-seven [deities].

original: dang /_/khams gsum rnam rgyal nga bdun bdag nyid do/_/tshhe dpag med pa
analyzed: dang /_/khams gsum rnam rgyal nga bdun bdag nyid do/_/tshhe dpag med pa
translated: The seventy-seven deities of the “Conquest of the Three Realms”🔽and the thirteen deities of the “Infinite Life”

original: bcu gsum bdag nyid lags/_/bde ba chen po brgya dang so brgyad bdag_/🔽'phags skor gsang 'dus so gnyis bdag nyid dang /_/ye shes zhabs lugs
analyzed: bcu gsum bdag nyid lags/_/bde ba chen po brgya dang so brgyad bdag_/ 'phags skor gsang 'dus so gnyis bdag nyid dang /_/ye shes zhabs lugs
translated: are the nature of the one hundred and thirty-eight deities of “Great Bliss.”🔽The fifty-two deities of the “Guhyasamaja of the Noble Tradition”🔽and the nineteen deities of the “Jnanapada Tradition”

original: bcu dgu'i bdag nyid do/_/rdo rje hum mdzad nyi shu'i bdag nyid can/_/'jam
analyzed: bcu dgu'i bdag nyid do/_/rdo rje hum mdzad nyi shu'i bdag nyid can/_/'jam
translated: are the nature of the twenty deities of “Vajra Humkara.”🔽The thirteen deities of “Manjushri the Black”

original: dpal nag po bcu gsum bdag nyid la/_/gdong drug khro bo nyer gcig bdag
analyzed: dpal nag po bcu gsum bdag nyid la/_/gdong drug khro bo nyer gcig bdag
translated: are the nature of the twenty-one deities of “Krodha Shadakshari.”🔽The fourteen deities of “Red Yamantaka”

original: nyid do/_/gshin rje gshed dmar bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid can/_/rdo rje
analyzed: nyid do/_/gshin rje gshed dmar bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid can/_/rdo rje
translated: are the nature of the nine deities of “Vajrabhairava.”

original: 'jigs byed lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/'jigs byed yab yum bco brgyad🔽bdag nyid yin/_/rdo rje 'jigs chung lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/zhal brgyad
analyzed: 'jigs byed lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/'jigs byed yab yum bco brgyad bdag nyid yin/_/rdo rje 'jigs chung lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/zhal brgyad
translated: The eighteen deities of “Bhairava and Bhairavi”🔽are the nature of the nine deities of “Lesser Vajrabhairava.”🔽The nine deities of “Eight-Faced, Sixteen-Armed Bhairava”

original: bcu drug phyag can lha dgu'i bdag_/zhal bzhi phyag drug lha dgu'i bdag nyid do//
analyzed: bcu drug phyag can lha dgu'i bdag_/zhal bzhi phyag drug lha dgu'i bdag nyid do//
translated: are the nature of the nine deities of “Four-Faced, Six-Armed Bhairava.”

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi lha dgu'i bdag nyid la/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang🔽lha dgu yin/_/bdag med ma ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid do/_/zhal brgyad mtshhon
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi lha dgu'i bdag nyid la/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang lha dgu yin/_/bdag med ma ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid do/_/zhal brgyad mtshhon
translated: one with one face and two arms, and is the nine deities.

original: rkang grangs rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/🔽rnams bco brgyad bdag nyid yin/_/phyag drug pa ni bco brgyad bdag nyid do/
analyzed: rkang grangs rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/ rnams bco brgyad bdag nyid yin/_/phyag drug pa ni bco brgyad bdag nyid do/
translated: Vajrayoginī is the embodiment of fifteen.🔽The one with eight faces is the embodiment of eighteen.🔽The one with four faces is the embodiment of thirty-two.🔽The one with two faces is the embodiment of thirty-two.

original: phyag bzhi pa ni bco brgyad kho na lags/_/phyag gnyis pa yang de dang mtshhungs🔽pa'o/_/bde mchog 'khor lo re gnyis bdag nyid dang /_/ser po zhal
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa ni bco brgyad kho na lags/_/phyag gnyis pa yang de dang mtshhungs pa'o/_/bde mchog 'khor lo re gnyis bdag nyid dang /_/ser po zhal
translated: The one with one face is the embodiment of thirty-two.🔽The one with four arms is the embodiment of thirty-two.🔽The one with six arms is the embodiment of thirty-two.🔽The one with two arms is the same as that.🔽The one with one face and two arms, who is the embodiment of the two Cakrasaṃvaras, is yellow.🔽The one with one face and two arms, who is the follower of Anupamā, is blue.

original: gcig a rnyi d+ha na'i rjes 'brangs phyag gnyis ro gnyis bdag_/sngon po zhal gcig pa
analyzed: gcig a rnyi d+ha na'i rjes 'brangs phyag gnyis ro gnyis bdag_/sngon po zhal gcig pa
translated: The one with one face and two arms is the same as that.

original: yang de dang mtshhungs/_/bde mchog yab bka' nyer dgu'i bdag nyid can/_/
analyzed: yang de dang mtshhungs/_/bde mchog yab bka' nyer dgu'i bdag nyid can/_/
translated: The one with one face and two arms, who is the embodiment of the twenty-nine father Cakrasaṃvaras, is blue.

original: bde mchog yum bka' so bdun bdag nyid do/_/sa ra ha'i bde mchog bcu
analyzed: bde mchog yum bka' so bdun bdag nyid do/_/sa ra ha'i bde mchog bcu
translated: The one with one face and two arms, who is the embodiment of the thirty-seven mother Cakrasaṃvaras, is red.🔽The one with one face and two arms, who is the embodiment of the nine Cakrasaṃvaras of Saraha, is blue.

original: gsum yin/_/lhan skyes bde mchog lha lnga'i bdag nyid dang /_/te lo pa'i
analyzed: gsum yin/_/lhan skyes bde mchog lha lnga'i bdag nyid dang /_/te lo pa'i
translated: The five deities of Coemergent Cakrasaṃvara,🔽The nine deities of Tilopa’s Cakrasaṃvara,

original: bde mchog lha dgu yin/_/gnyis med rdo rje lha brgyad bdag nyid can/_/rdo🔽rje mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid dang /_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i
analyzed: bde mchog lha dgu yin/_/gnyis med rdo rje lha brgyad bdag nyid can/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid dang /_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i
translated: The eight deities of Nondual Vajra,🔽The nine deities of Vajraḍāka,🔽The nine deities of Buddhaḍāka,

original: bdag nyid la/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/pad+ma mkha'
analyzed: bdag nyid la/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/pad+ma mkha'
translated: The nine deities of Ratnaḍāka,🔽The nine deities of Padmaḍāka,

original: 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid lags/_/las kyi mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid yin/🔽rdo rje sems dpa' bco brgyad bdag nyid dang /_/rnam par snang mdzad bco
analyzed: 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid lags/_/las kyi mkha' 'gro lha dgu'i bdag nyid yin/ rdo rje sems dpa' bco brgyad bdag nyid dang /_/rnam par snang mdzad bco
translated: And the nine deities of Karmaḍāka.🔽The eighteen deities of Vajrasattva,🔽The eighteen deities of Vairocana,

original: brgyad bdag nyid la/_/rin chen 'byung ldan bco brgyad bdag nyid de/_/
analyzed: brgyad bdag nyid la/_/rin chen 'byung ldan bco brgyad bdag nyid de/_/
translated: The eighteen deities of Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: snang ba mtha' yas bco brgyad bdag nyid lags/_/don yod grub pa bco
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas bco brgyad bdag nyid lags/_/don yod grub pa bco
translated: The eighteen deities of Amitābha,🔽The eighteen deities of Amoghasiddhi,

original: brgyad bdag nyid de/_/mi bskyod rdo rje bco brgyad bdag nyid do/_/sam b+hu
analyzed: brgyad bdag nyid de/_/mi bskyod rdo rje bco brgyad bdag nyid do/_/sam b+hu
translated: And the eighteen deities of Akṣobhya Vajra.

original: tri'i lha mo nyer gsum bdag_/ma ha ma ya lha drug bdag nyid la/_/sgyu ma chen
analyzed: tri'i lha mo nyer gsum bdag_/ma ha ma ya lha drug bdag nyid la/_/sgyu ma chen
translated: The twenty-three deities of Tārā are the nature of the six deities of Mahamaya.

original: mo lha drug bdag nyid dang /_/ku ku ri pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis/_/drang🔽srong rgyu skar zhe lnga'i bdag nyid de/_/rgyal chen phyogs skyong nyer gsum bdag
analyzed: mo lha drug bdag nyid dang /_/ku ku ri pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis/_/drang srong rgyu skar zhe lnga'i bdag nyid de/_/rgyal chen phyogs skyong nyer gsum bdag
translated: The six deities of Mahāmāyā and the two Vajrasattvas of Kukkuripa are the nature of the🔽thirty-three deities of the great sages and the twenty-eight lunar mansions.🔽The twenty-three deities of the great kings and the guardians of the directions are the nature of the thirteen deities of the eight great nāgas.

original: nyid la/_/klu chen brgyad ni bcu gsum bdag nyid do/_/nam mkha'i rnal
analyzed: nyid la/_/klu chen brgyad ni bcu gsum bdag nyid do/_/nam mkha'i rnal
translated: The thirteen deities of the eight great nāgas are the nature of the seventeen deities of Ākāśagarbha.

original: 'byor nga bdun bdag nyid la/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bcu gsum bdag nyid do/_/
analyzed: 'byor nga bdun bdag nyid la/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bcu gsum bdag nyid do/_/
translated: The seventeen deities of Ākāśagarbha are the nature of the thirteen deities of the knowledge ḍākinīs.🔽The thirteen deities of the knowledge ḍākinīs are the nature of the twenty-five deities of Buddhakapāla.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa nyer lnga'i bdag nyid de/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas thod pa lha
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa nyer lnga'i bdag nyid de/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas thod pa lha
translated: The twenty-five deities of Buddhakapāla are the nature of the nine deities of Buddhakapāla.🔽The nine deities of Buddhakapāla are the nature of the eleven deities of Vajra Tārā.

original: dgu'i bdag_/rdo rje sgrol ma bcu gcig bdag nyid la/_/ku ru kul+le bcu
analyzed: dgu'i bdag_/rdo rje sgrol ma bcu gcig bdag nyid la/_/ku ru kul+le bcu
translated: The eleven deities of Vajra Tārā are the nature of the thirteen deities of Kurukullā.🔽The thirteen deities of Kurukullā are the nature of the twenty-five deities of Marīcī.

original: gsum bdag nyid de/_/'od zer can ni nyer lnga'i bdag nyid la/_/dbyangs
analyzed: gsum bdag nyid de/_/'od zer can ni nyer lnga'i bdag nyid la/_/dbyangs
translated: The twenty-five deities of Marīcī are the nature of the thirteen deities of white Sarasvatī.

original: can dkar mo bcu gsum bdag nyid yin/_/yum chen mo ni nga dgu'i bdag
analyzed: can dkar mo bcu gsum bdag nyid yin/_/yum chen mo ni nga dgu'i bdag
translated: The thirteen deities of white Sarasvatī are the nature of the nineteen deities of Mahāmāyā.

original: nyid do/_/dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi brgya gya bzhi'i bdag_/'jam dpal rdo rje
analyzed: nyid do/_/dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi brgya gya bzhi'i bdag_/'jam dpal rdo rje
translated: The Wheel of Time has 484 deities,🔽Mañjuvajra has 43,

analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsha gsum ste/_/ngag gi dbang phyug brgya dang bcu dgu yin/_/mtshhan
translated: the Lord of Speech has 119,

analyzed: brjod zab pa nyer gcig bdag nyid la/_/pad+ma gar dbang bco brgyad bdag
translated: the profound expression of the twenty-one has a nature of 18,🔽the Lotus Lord of Dance has an 18-fold nature,

original: nyid de/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bcu bdun bdag nyid dang /_/a ra pa tsha lha
analyzed: nyid de/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bcu bdun bdag nyid dang /_/a ra pa tsha lha
translated: the Vajrasattva has a 17-fold nature,🔽and the five deities of Arapatsa,

original: lnga'i bdag nyid yin/_/gzungs chen gra lnga bcu bdun bdag nyid de/_/mi
analyzed: lnga'i bdag nyid yin/_/gzungs chen gra lnga bcu bdun bdag nyid de/_/mi
translated: the 57 deities of the Great Dhāraṇī,🔽the eleven deities of the Acala Lord,

original: g.yo mgon po bcu gcig bdag nyid do/_/'khor lo chen po bcu bzhi'i bdag🔽nyid de/_/bdud rtshi thigs pa lha ni gcig pa la/_/de bzhin mdor bsdus
analyzed: g.yo mgon po bcu gcig bdag nyid do/_/'khor lo chen po bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid de/_/bdud rtshi thigs pa lha ni gcig pa la/_/de bzhin mdor bsdus
translated: the fourteen deities of the Great Wheel,🔽and the single deity of the Mārajita are also accepted as being concise.

analyzed: pa'ang gcig tu bzhed/_/mchod rten sngon po'i gzungs ni lha bdun la/_/
translated: The seven deities of the Blue Stūpa Dhāraṇī,🔽the five deities of Caṇḍa Mahāroṣaṇa,

analyzed: gtum po khyung gsham lha ni lnga ru 'dod/_/khyung nag 'bar ba lha dgu'i bdag

analyzed: nyid yin/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang lha bcu'i bdag nyid la/_/seng ge sgra ni
translated: Avalokiteśvara is the nature of ten deities,🔽and Siṃhanāda is the essence of five.

analyzed: lnga'i ngo bo can/_/don yod zhags pa'i lha ni lnga yin te/_/ti li phag mo zhal
translated: Amoghapāśa has five deities, and Trili is the nature of thirteen.

original: gsum phyag drug bcu gsum bdag_/na ro'i phag mo bcu gsum bdag nyid de//
analyzed: gsum phyag drug bcu gsum bdag_/na ro'i phag mo bcu gsum bdag nyid de//
translated: Vārāhī with three faces and six arms is the nature of thirteen,🔽and the two-faced one is the nature of thirteen.

original: zhal gnyis ma ni bcu gsum bdag nyid la/_/don grub ma ni bcu gsum bdag
analyzed: zhal gnyis ma ni bcu gsum bdag nyid la/_/don grub ma ni bcu gsum bdag
translated: Amoghadarśin is the nature of thirteen,

original: nyid can/_/dbu bcad ma ni bcu gsum bdag nyid do/_/phag mo nag mo lha
analyzed: nyid can/_/dbu bcad ma ni bcu gsum bdag nyid do/_/phag mo nag mo lha
translated: and the decapitated one is the nature of thirteen.

analyzed: lnga'i bdag nyid yin/_/mi tri mkha' spyod lha dgu'i bdag nyid de/_/phag mo
translated: Black Vārāhī is the nature of five deities, and Mitrī is the nature of nine sky-farers.

analyzed: zhal bzhi so bdun bdag nyid lags/_/nyi ma sbas pa'i sgrol ma nyer gcig
translated: Vārāhī with four faces is the nature of thirty-seven,🔽and Sūryagupta Tārā is the nature of twenty-one.

original: lags/_/sku gdung bstan pa rigs brgya'i bdag nyid dang /_/mi bskyod
analyzed: lags/_/sku gdung bstan pa rigs brgya'i bdag nyid dang /_/mi bskyod
translated: The teaching of the relics is the nature of a hundred families, and Akṣobhya

original: kag ni bcu gsum bdag nyid lags/_/gtsho mo chen mo'i lha ni so lnga yin/_/
analyzed: kag ni bcu gsum bdag nyid lags/_/gtsho mo chen mo'i lha ni so lnga yin/_/
translated: is the nature of thirteen. Mahārohiṇī has thirty-five deities.

original: grangs rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/
analyzed: grangs rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/
translated: The Garland of Jewels: A Numerical Teaching

analyzed: rdo rje rnam 'joms nyer gsum bdag nyid can/_/gtshug tor rnam rgyal lha
translated: The twenty-three deities of Vajravidāraṇa,🔽The nine deities of Uṣṇīṣavijayā,

original: dgu'i bdag nyid do/_/gtshug tor gdugs dkar nyer dgu'i bdag nyid do/_/
analyzed: dgu'i bdag nyid do/_/gtshug tor gdugs dkar nyer dgu'i bdag nyid do/_/
translated: And the twenty-nine deities of Uṣṇīṣa Sitātapatrā.🔽The five deities of Pīta Śavarī

analyzed: ser mo sha ba ri ni lha lnga la/_/gnod sbyin 'dzam lha bco brgyad bdag nyid do/_/

analyzed: mgon po nag po lha dgu'i bdag nyid lags/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga brgya dang rtsha

analyzed: brgyad kyi/_/sa'i cho gar ldan pas thig gdab la/_/tshhogs bsag byin brlab
translated: The ritual of the site, the layout of the maṇḍala,🔽The accumulation of merit, the consecration,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gling dgur bri/_/bla ma bskyed rims ldan pas bum bsnyen bya/_/
translated: The maṇḍala with nine sectors, the approach of the vase,🔽The offering of oblations, the ablution of the disciples,

analyzed: bgegs gtor btang zhing slob ma khrus byas te/_/dkyil 'khor gzhug phyir

analyzed: gsol gdab ye shes dbab/_/lo drang me tog dor zhing lha ngo bstan/_/rig

analyzed: pa'i dbang lnga brtul zhugs drug gnas dang /_/rdo rje slob dpon dbang rnams

analyzed: rdzogs par sbyin/_/bla med rgyud kyi dbang bzhi rdzogs par bskur/_/gtor chog bla

translated: This text called The Precious Garland, with thirty-four verses,🔽was composed by the lord who attained siddhis of Avalokiteśvara,

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug mi ta rnyo kis mdzad pa rdzogs snyo//
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug mi ta rnyo kis mdzad pa rdzogs snyo//
translated: the lord of yogins Mitrayogi.

original: de'i slob ma pan ti ta a mo g+ha badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//_//
analyzed: de'i slob ma pan ti ta a mo g+ha badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//_//
translated: His disciple, the paṇḍita Amoghavajra, translated it himself.

original: bsdur ma na/
analyzed: bsdur ma na/
translated: In the Tibetan
